title: Cythe
description: The second installment of the Tales of Suruale epic fantasy series. In this novelette dig deeper into the workings of the Order of Assassins and learn more about the world of Suruale. Cythe, the young jewelcrafter of Khorne, is approached to accept a dangerous mission . . . or die! Includes an added Bonus Feature -- the first chapter of the first book in the series, Tales of Suruale: Davi.
author: Roy C. Booth
